Module com.example.demo
Package client

Class Controller

java.lang.Object
client.Controller
public class Controller extends Object
Class that is responsible for @FXML variables passed from GUI. Processes all the data connected with GUI and passes more specified tasks to other classes.

      public Controller()

  • Method Details

    • gameBoardClicked

      protected void gameBoardClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method that defines the point chosen to show available moves on the game board (@param playGame) or make one and send to server. When specified server signals come that turns on or off the booleans controlling the player`s step flow. May show messages to finish turn or that it`s not the turn of the user.
      Parameters:
      event - parameter that defines the location in GUI window where #onMouseClicked action happened.

    • buttonBoardMouseClicked

      protected void buttonBoardMouseClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method covers the cases of different buttons clicked on the game board (@param playGame).
      Parameters:
      event - parameter that defines the location in GUI window where #onMouseClicked action happened.

    • resultClicked

      protected void resultClicked()
      When the button on the @param gameResults box is clicked the program aborts.

    • greetingsClicked

      protected void greetingsClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      When the button on the greetingsBox is clicked depending on which button player chooses sets @param greetingsChoice to 1 or 2.
      Parameters:
      event - parameter that defines the location in GUI window where #onMouseClicked action happened.

    • chooseColorClicked

      protected void chooseColorClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      When button the @param chooseColor box is clicked sends the color written on the button to the server. Sets the buttons and boxes not needed to not managable and not visible and the opposite for what is needed next.
      Parameters:
      event - parameter that defines the location in GUI window where #onMouseClicked action happened.

    • connectServerClicked

      protected void connectServerClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method responsible for server connection. If the connection did not succeed shows the @param connectionErrorLabel to player. Does not allow user to proceed forward until the correct data is written.
      Parameters:
      event - parameter that defines the location in GUI window where #onMouseClicked action happened.

    • playerCountClicked

      protected void playerCountClicked(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      Method that detects the player count written on the button and sends it to the server. Handles scene content for further settings before the game.
      Parameters:
      event - parameter that defines the location in GUI window where #onMouseClicked action happened.

    • CheckServerMsg

      protected void CheckServerMsg(String message)
      Method that accepts different signals from server and manages the game flow.
      Parameters:
      message - message sent from server

    • connect

      protected void connect()
      Method that creates new clients and connects this controller to the server else shows error message

    • getConnectionError

      protected boolean getConnectionError()
      Method for testing the connection.
      Returns:
      if error occurred.

    • get2Players

      protected boolean get2Players()
      Method for testing.
      Returns:
      if the server message recieved and there are two players on game.
